document_data.name: Spectral Hand
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spectral hand''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that summoned a ghostly appendage to do the caster's bidding.
document_data.Effects: This spell used a bit of the caster's life force to create a ghostly hand to behave as the caster desired. The ''spectral hand'' could be used to deliver touch spells with a greater chance of contacting the target. The caster would feel any damage caused to the hand which would also end the spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: [[Necrophant]]s of [[Velsharoon]] could cast this spell once per day.
